name: S Sameer
aboutMeHeadline: I'm s sameer, a Executive Software Developer, Flutter developer.
aboueMeDetails: I\'m a Fresh Graduate with Electronics and communication as Majors from SJC Institution of Technology, Chickballapur(Karnataka). I have been developing mobile and web apps for over 6 Months now. I have worked in teams for startup and helped them in launching their prototypes and got valuable learning experience. Currently working as Executive Software Developer at Native Minds Technology PVT LDT
